YT看看就好 千萬不要自己玩 想玩選人就好 玩鬼心態一場就沒了 這遊戲潛規則一堆 玩鬼不能針對 玩人不能BM 
我鬼沒打針對每場四逃 針對也只能殺1 2個 作業感超重 不是特殊時期 血點比錢還難賺 我新手鬼最多一兩殺 開局總算找到人 雖小追到會玩的 運氣好上鉤 運氣不好還在追 還被叮三台 我怎賺血點 還要防啥 壓板 打頭 拆鉤 手電筒 一堆 我抱個人 事前準備比我考試還久

當你搞懂後就會明白了。這必定是個前衛大膽的想法。面對如此難題，我們必須設想周全。維納德說過一句著名的話，沒有追求的人，必然是怠情的。希望大家能發現話中之話。

這款遊戲因何而發生？雨果說過一句很有意思的話，我們的精神圍繞著真理運轉，好像群星圍繞著太陽。這讓我的思緒清晰了。這款遊戲的存在，令我無法停止對他的思考。我們一般認為，抓住了問題的關鍵，其他一切則會迎刃而解。巴爾扎克說過一句富有哲理的話，人生是各種不同的變故循環不已的痛苦和歡樂組成的。那種永遠不變的藍天只存在於心靈中間，向現實的人生去要求未免是奢望。這句話決定了一切。由於，需要考慮周詳這款遊戲的影響及因應對策。

Me encantó, es el juego perfecto para quienes le guste la adrenalina de atrapar o ser atrapados, como el juego de la mancha cuando éramos chicos, pero en este caso de terror, además fusiona muy bien los personajes de terror clásicos con los de series actuales, realmente muy acertado. Lo genial es que hay personajes con diferentes habilidades y eso hace que sea un juego dinámico y entretenido.

Used to love this game, and spent thousands of hours playing it on Ps4 before upgrading to pc. But in my game time and stay on pc, it has been a pain, annoyance and frustrating time. With not being able to play with friends or in groups. Due to countless, "An unknown error occured" Issue. I've grown to lose the enjoyment and fun that I used to have for DBD.

Everytime I try getting back into Dead by Daylight, I get reminded why I uninstall it in the first place.
Game is filled with hackers, and it's not just one game every once in a while, in which case, it'd be "Oh okay whatever". It's too often, to the point where you think every game you get into, there's a hacker in there, who's going to make your enjoyment go down to oblivion.
Getting matched against speedhackers, instant healers, etc. is one thing. But when they start taking the game hostage by forcing a state on their character to which you literally can't do anything but leave the game, I'd rather waste my time somewhere else.

It's toxic nobody can talk during the match and the shit people say post game is amazing.  If you have experience in CoD or League environments you can fit right in.  Either be a sneaky rat and rush gens or be a big dick fighter distracting the killer both work.  You could also be the killer and mega mind outsmart 4 other people and crush their will to live.  It's evil full of hate and i love it. It's also pretty old but a community is still there and every update brings back the vets almost without fail.
